alert.note: Alert for Greene; Hale; Marengo; Sumter (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 09 at 10:14AM CDT until April 13 at 1:52PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Birmingham AL has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Alabama... Tombigbee River At Demopolis Lock and Dam affecting Hale, Marengo, Greene and Sumter Counties. .Heavy rainfall has occurred over the past 24 hours over the Tombigbee River basin and a flood warning is now in effect for the Tombigbee River. Another statement will be issued by late tonight, or sooner if conditions warrant. && ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM LATE MONDAY NIGHT TO EARLY THURSDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Tombigbee River At Demopolis Lock and Dam. * WHEN...From late Monday night to early Thursday afternoon. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:15 AM CDT Sunday the stage was 58.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early Tuesday morning to a crest of 69.3 feet Tuesday evening. It will then fall below flood stage early Thursday morning. - Flood stage is 68.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
